model.card.type

Class AbstractCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.card.type.AbstractCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICard
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardBan, CardComodin4, CardComodinColor, CardInvertir, CardNum, CardRobar2, CardSaltar, CardZAWARUDO, DrawCard, NullCard

    public abstract class AbstractCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICard
    This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Card interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
    Author:
    Sebastian Alfaro

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        otherCard - The card below this card.
